items.code: frappe.msgprint(msg, title, raise_exception, as_table, as_list, indicator, primary_action)
items.description: Shows a message dialog to the user in the Desk UI who initiated the request. This method works only within a request-response cycle.
items.example:
# Simple message
frappe.msgprint('Document has been submitted successfully.')

# Message with title and exception
frappe.msgprint(
    msg='The selected file could not be found.',
    title='Error',
    raise_exception=FileNotFoundError
)

# Message with a primary action
frappe.msgprint(
    msg='Do you want to proceed with this action?',
    primary_action={
        'label': 'Proceed',
        'server_action': 'dotted.path.to.server.method',
        'args': { 'id': 123 }
    }
)

items.description: A wrapper around `frappe.msgprint` that raises an exception and shows a message dialog to the user. By default, it raises a `frappe.ValidationError`.
